name: Arc'teryx Cormac Short Sleeve Crew - Men's
description: Lightweight and breathable performance for your high-output summer activities. The Ostria™ fabric allows air and moisture to move through to speed drying and ensure you won't overheat. The stretch knit design allows unrestricted movement for running, climbing, or any other hot-weather workout.Made of highly breathable Ostria™ polyester to help regulate your temperate and keep you comfortable.Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection.Underarm gussets allow freedom of movement.
